backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing implemented resume-extraction, phone-number, and conditional-section features with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files, including styling, Tailwind config, resume data, layout components, and section components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup with extensive OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: App entry HTML defining head metadata, Google Fonts preconnect, favicon, and root div for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component rendering all resume sections and conditionally showing the Projects section based on data.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with copyright text and caffeine.ai attribution using a decorative heart icon.
frontend/src/components/layout/Section.t: Reusable section wrapper that adds consistent layout, optional titles, and spacing.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Responsive navigation bar generating links based on resume data and supporting smooth scrolling and a mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section showing summary and contact details, conditionally rendering location, email, and phone.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact section with copy‑to‑clipboard email, optional phone display, and conditional social link rendering.
frontend/src/components/sections/Educati: Renders an education section displaying each education entry from resumeData with degree, institution, location, and period.
frontend/src/components/sections/Experie: Displays work experience entries from resumeData with job details, description, and bullet-point highlights.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Builds a hero banner showing name, location, headline, summary, and buttons for navigation with a decorative image.
frontend/src/components/sections/Project: Shows a grid of project cards from resumeData including title, description, technologies, and optional external link.
frontend/src/components/sections/SkillsS: Lists skill categories from resumeData, displaying each skill as a styled badge.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query backend hooks; currently empty.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and CSS variables for theming, including light and dark palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/resumeData.ts: Defines interfaces for resume-related data and exports a static resumeData object containing experience, education, skills, and contact info.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom typography, colors, animations, and plugins for container queries and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including versioning, summary, and a list of implemented resume‑site features and requirements.
